name: ListExpenses
description:
Retrieve a list of expenses with pagination.

Use this tool to get a paginated list of all expenses recorded in the system.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the organization whose expenses are being queried.

value_schema.description: ID of the organization

parameters.name: search_by_description
parameters.description: Search expenses by description, supports 'description_startswith' and 'description_contains'. Max-length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by description.Variants description_startswith and description_contains. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: search_by_reference_number
parameters.description: Search expenses by part or complete reference number using 'startswith' or 'contains'. Max-length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by reference number. Variants reference_number_startswith and reference_number_contains. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: filter_by_date
parameters.description: Search expenses by expense date. Use variants: date_start, date_end, date_before, or date_after. Format [yyyy-mm-dd].

value_schema.description: Search expenses by expense date. Variants date_start, date_end, date_before and date_after. Format [yyyy-mm-dd]

parameters.name: expense_status
parameters.description: Search expenses by status. Allowed values: unbilled, invoiced, reimbursed, non-billable, billable.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by expense status. Allowed Values unbilled, invoiced, reimbursed, non-billable and billable

parameters.name: amount_filter
parameters.description: Search expenses by amount using the variants: less_than, less_equals, greater_than, or greater_equals.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by amount. Variants: amount_less_than, amount_less_equals, amount_greater_than and amount_greater_than

parameters.name: search_expense_account_name
parameters.description: Search expenses by account name. Use 'startswith:' or 'contains:'. Max length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by expense account name. Variants account_name_startswith and account_name_contains. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: customer_name_filter
parameters.description: Filter expenses by customer name. Supports 'startswith' and 'contains' variants. Max length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by customer name. Variants: customer_name_startswith and customer_name_contains. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: vendor_name_filter
parameters.description: Filter expenses by vendor name using 'vendor_name_startswith' or 'vendor_name_contains'.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by vendor name. Variants: vendor_name_startswith and vendor_name_contains.

parameters.name: expense_account_customer_id
parameters.description: The ID of the expense account for the customer. Use this to filter expenses specific to a customer's account.

value_schema.description: ID of the expense account.

parameters.name: vendor_id
parameters.description: ID of the vendor associated with the expense.

value_schema.description: ID of the vendor the expense is made.

parameters.name: recurring_expense_id
parameters.description: The ID used to search for expenses associated with a recurring expense.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by recurring expense id.

parameters.name: paid_through_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the account through which the expense was paid.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by paid through account id.

parameters.name: search_expenses_text
parameters.description: Search expenses by account name, description, customer name, or vendor name. Maximum length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by account name or description or customer name or vendor name. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: sort_expenses_by
parameters.description: Sort expenses by the specified column. Allowed values: date, account_name, total, bcy_total, reference_number, customer_name, created_time.

value_schema.description: Sort expenses.Allowed Values date, account_name, total, bcy_total, reference_number, customer_name and created_time

parameters.name: expense_status_filter
parameters.description: Filter expenses by status. Allowed values: 'Status.All', 'Status.Billable', 'Status.Nonbillable', 'Status.Reimbursed', 'Status.Invoiced', 'Status.Unbilled'.

value_schema.description: Filter expenses by expense status. Allowed Values Status.All, Status.Billable, Status.Nonbillable, Status.Reimbursed, Status.Invoicedand Status.Unbilled

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Page number to fetch, with the default starting at 1.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Number of expense records to fetch per page. Defaults to 200 if not specified.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.
